channel.title: Rselenium on Tobias Recke
channel.description: Recent content in Rselenium on Tobias Recke

item.title: Scrape Brandenburgs water data from metaver.de
item.description: library(rvest) library(dplyr) library(magrittr) library(RSelenium) library(stringr) Specify chrome download folder in RSelenium found here eCaps <- list(chromeOptions = list( prefs = list( "profile.default_content_settings.popups" = 0L, "download.prompt_for_download" = FALSE, "download.default_directory" = paste0(getwd(), '/down_f') ) )) rD <- rsDriver(browser = "chrome", extraCapabilities = eCaps) remDr <- rD[["client"]] session <-"https://metaver.de/search/dls/#?serviceId=365B64CD-55CA-4C65-8F48-8B93B9C06E40" remDr$navigate(session) # capture the titles with rvest hvt <- read_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]]) sln <-html_nodes(hvt, css = "#templateContainer > accordion > div") %>% html_children() class_heeading <-bind_rows(lapply(xml_attrs(sln), function(x) data.
